title: Crown of Madness
content:
ll in Baldur's Gate 3. Crown of Madness is a Lvl 2 Spell from the Enchantment school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Crown of Madness Information

Description: Instill madness in a humanoid enemy, making them attack the creature closest to them (other than you), even if it's allied. Level: Lvl 2 spell School: Enchantment School Casting Time: Action Duration: 3 turns Range: 18m Requires Concentration: Y
